metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32636 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in glib, where the gvariant deserialization code is vulnerable to a denial of service introduced by additional input validation added to resolve CVE-2023-29499. The offset table validation may be very slow. This bug does not affect any released version of glib but does affect glib distributors who followed the guidance of glib developers to backport the initial fix for CVE-2023-29499.

criterions.comment: glib2.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
